description: The DM51/DM51A1 fragmentation grenade is the standard hand grenade of the German Bundeswehr, where DM stands for “Deutsches Modell” (German model). Its introduction in 1974/75 replaced the DM41 fragmentation hand grenade and DT11, DT11B1 and DM21 explosive hand grenades used in the Bundeswehr.
name: DM51
